attributes.action: Public inquiry into Covid-19 pandemic immediately (not next spring!)
attributes.additional_details:
Public inquiry into Covid-19 pandemic immediately with the aim of saving lives. Lessons need be learnt about how the handling of the pandemic has led to the UK having the highest death toll in Europe.
It's critical to identify what went wrong, with the first and second waves so we can take action to prevent further avoidable deaths from the impending third wave of the Indian variant.
attributes.background:
Public inquiry into Covid-19 pandemic immediately. Lessons need be learnt about how the handling of the pandemic has led to the UK having the highest death toll in Europe! 
We are about to have a third-wave and the government will continue to make the same mistakes if allowed to!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Start a full public inquiry into COVID by July 2021, to report within 12 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587431
